casebody.data:
In re: Gutowski 280P15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Michael D. Gutowski, for Gutowski, Michael D., et al. Mary Anne Gutowski, for Gutowski, Mary Anne. Emily F. Lowder, Attorney at Law, Michael T. Hosmer, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Jeremy B. Wilkins, Attorney at Law, for Bank of America, N.A.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of August 2015 by Respondents to Enjoin All Other State Actions:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
